gameDetails.name: Cartographers: Skills Mini Expansion 2
gameDetails.description:
As your party sets out across the Western Lands of Nalos, you acquire valuable skills to aid in your map-making. Spend your coins wisely to make the best use of your newfound talents and emerge with the queen’s favor!

During setup, you will shuffle the eight skill cards and deal three of them face up, returning the remainder to the box. Once per season, each player may activate the ability of one of three face-up skill cards by paying its cost in coins.

These skills can be combined with those in Cartographers: Skills Mini Expansion

Was also available as part of the rewards for backing Game Boy Geek 2021 Kickstarter campaign.
-description from designer
